org.project

Class Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.project.Serializer

  • public final class Serializer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to store the information, representing them in a JSON format file. NOTE: it is a wrapper that contains another serializer ObjectMapper.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.codehaus.jackson.map.ObjectMapper JSONMapper
      This variable is the serializer from the jackson.xml package.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Serializer()
      This constructor sets the JSONMapper variable with proper visibility and configuration to read the object it has to serialize.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void serialize(Article[] articles, java.lang.String filePath)
      This method is used to format the content of the articles in JSON and to store it into a file with JSON format.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • JSONMapper

        This variable is the serializer from the jackson.xml package.

      • Serializer

        public Serializer()
           throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor sets the JSONMapper variable with proper visibility and configuration to read the object it has to serialize.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public void serialize(Article[] articles,
                      java.lang.String filePath)
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to format the content of the articles in JSON and to store it into a file with JSON format.
        Parameters:
        filePath - which is the path of the file for storing the Article array articles
        articles - which is the Article array to serialize in the file at filePath path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
